template.name: HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP
template.description:
Template Net HP Enterprise Switch
MIBs used: NETSWITCH-MIB HP-ICF-CHASSIS ENTITY-SENSORS-MIB IF-MIB EtherLike-MIB SEMI-MIB HOST-RESOURCES-MIB SNMPv2-MIB ENTITY-MIB STATISTICS-MIB
Generated by official Zabbix template tool "Templator"

trigger.name: HP Enterprise Switch: ICMP ping ile erişilemiyor.
trigger.description: Last three attempts returned timeout. Please check device connectivity.

trigger.expression: min(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/icmppingloss,5m)<100
trigger.name: HP Enterprise Switch: Yüksek ICMP ping kaybı.

dependency.name: HP Enterprise Switch: ICMP ping ile erişilemiyor.

trigger.name: HP Enterprise Switch: Yüksek ICMP ping yanıt süresi.
trigger.description: Average ICMP response time is too high.

dependency.name: HP Enterprise Switch: ICMP ping ile erişilemiyor.
HP Enterprise Switch: Yüksek ICMP ping kaybı.
dependency.expression: min(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/icmppingloss,5m)<100

item.name: SNMP traps (fallback)
item.description: The item is used to collect all SNMP traps unmatched by other snmptrap items

item.name: System contact details
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: CPU utilization
item.description: MIB: STATISTICS-MIB The CPU utilization in percent(%). Reference: http://h20564.www2.hpe.com/hpsc/doc/public/display?docId=emr_na-c02597344&sp4ts.oid=51079

trigger.name: HP Enterprise Switch: Yüksek CPU kullanımı.
trigger.event_name: HP Enterprise Switch: Yüksek CPU kullanımı (over {$CPU.UTIL.CRIT}% for 5m)
trigger.description: The CPU utilization is too high. The system might be slow to respond.

item.name: System description
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software.

item.name: Firmware version
item.description: MIB: NETSWITCH-MIB Contains the operating code version number (also known as software or firmware). For example, a software version such as A.08.01 is described as follows: A the function set available in your router 08 the common release number 01 updates to the current common release

trigger.expression: last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/system.hw.firmware,#1)<>last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/system.hw.firmware,#2) and length(last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/system.hw.firmware))>0
trigger.name: HP Enterprise Switch: Firmware değiştirildi.
trigger.description: Firmware version has changed. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

trigger.expression: last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/system.hw.serialnumber,#1)<>last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/system.hw.serialnumber,#2) and length(last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/system.hw.serialnumber))>0
trigger.name: HP Enterprise Switch: Cihaz değiştirildi (yeni seri numarası alındı).
trigger.event_name: HP Enterprise Switch: Cihaz değiştirildi (yeni seri numarası alındı).
trigger.description: The device serial number has changed. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

item.name: Uptime (hardware)
item.description: MIB: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB The amount of time since this host was last initialized. Note that this is different from sysUpTime in the SNMPv2-MIB [RFC1907] because sysUpTime is the uptime of the network management portion of the system.

item.name: System location
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB Physical location of the node (e.g., `equipment room`, `3rd floor`). If not provided, the value is a zero-length string.

item.name: System name
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB An administratively-assigned name for this managed node.By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

trigger.expression: last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/system.name,#1)<>last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/system.name,#2) and length(last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/system.name))>0
trigger.name: HP Enterprise Switch: Sistem adı değiştirildi.
trigger.event_name: HP Enterprise Switch: Sistem adı değiştirildi (yeni ad: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: The name of the system has changed. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

item.name: Uptime (network)
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB Time (in hundredths of a second) since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

item.name: System object ID
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The vendor's authoritative identification of the network management subsystem contained in the entity. This value is allocated within the SMI enterprises subtree (1.3.6.1.4.1) and provides an easy and unambiguous means for determining`what kind of box' is being managed. For example, if vendor`Flintstones, Inc.' was assigned the subtree1.3.6.1.4.1.4242, it could assign the identifier 1.3.6.1.4.1.4242.1.1 to its `Fred Router'.

item.name: SNMP agent availability
item.description: Availability of SNMP checks on the host. The value of this item corresponds to availability icons in the host list. Possible values: 0 - not available 1 - available 2 - unknown

trigger.name: HP Enterprise Switch: SNMP veri toplama yapılmıyor.
trigger.description: SNMP is not available for polling. Please check device connectivity and SNMP settings.

dependency.name: HP Enterprise Switch: ICMP ping ile erişilemiyor.

item_prototype.name: {#ENT_NAME}: Donanım model adı.
item_prototype.description: MIB: ENTITY-MIB

item_prototype.name: {#ENT_NAME}: Donanım sürümü (revizyon).
item_prototype.description: MIB: ENTITY-MIB

discovery_rule.name: FAN Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovering all entities of hpicfSensorObjectId that ends with: 11.2.3.7.8.3.2 - fans and are present

item_prototype.name: {#ENT_DESCR}: Fan durumu.
item_prototype.description: MIB: HP-ICF-CHASSIS Actual status indicated by the sensor: {#ENT_DESCR}

trigger_prototype.name: HP Enterprise Switch: {#ENT_DESCR}: Fan kritik durumda.
HP Enterprise Switch: {#ENT_DESCR}: Fan uyarı durumunda.

dependency.name: HP Enterprise Switch: {#ENT_DESCR}: Fan kritik durumda.

discovery_rule.name: Memory Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of NETSWITCH-MIB::hpLocalMemTable, A table that contains information on all the local memory for each slot.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPVALUE}: Kullanılabilir bellek.
item_prototype.description: MIB: NETSWITCH-MIB The number of available (unallocated) bytes.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPVALUE}: Toplam bellek.
item_prototype.description: MIB: NETSWITCH-MIB The number of currently installed bytes.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPVALUE}: Kullanılan bellek.
item_prototype.description: MIB: NETSWITCH-MIB The number of currently allocated bytes.

item_prototype.name: #{#SNMPVALUE}: Bellek kullanımı.
item_prototype.description: Memory utilization in %.

trigger_prototype.name: HP Enterprise Switch: #{#SNMPVALUE}: Yüksek bellek kullanımı.
trigger_prototype.event_name: HP Enterprise Switch: #{#SNMPVALUE}: High memory utilization (>{$MEMORY.UTIL.MAX}% for 5m)
trigger_prototype.description: The system is running out of free memory.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Gelen paketler atıldı.
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The number of inbound packets which were chosen to be discarded even though no errors had been detected to prevent their being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. One possible reason for discarding such a packet could be to free up buffer space. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Hatalı gelen paketler.
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of inbound packets that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of inbound transmission units that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Alınan bitler.
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The total number of octets received on the interface, including framing characters. This object is a 64-bit version of ifInOctets. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Giden paketler atıldı.
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The number of outbound packets which were chosen to be discarded even though no errors had been detected to prevent their being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. One possible reason for discarding such a packet could be to free up buffer space. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Hatalı giden paketler.
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of outbound packets that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of outbound transmission units that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Gönderilen bitler.
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The total number of octets transmitted out of the interface, including framing characters. This object is a 64-bit version of ifOutOctets.Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Hız.
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB An estimate of the interface's current bandwidth in units of 1,000,000 bits per second. If this object reports a value of `n' then the speed of the interface is somewhere in the range of `n-500,000' to`n+499,999'. For interfaces which do not vary in bandwidth or for those where no accurate estimation can be made, this object should contain the nominal bandwidth. For a sub-layer which has no concept of bandwidth, this object should be zero.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Operasyonel durum.
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The current operational state of the interface. - The testing(3) state indicates that no operational packet scan be passed - If ifAdminStatus is down(2) then ifOperStatus should be down(2) - If ifAdminStatus is changed to up(1) then ifOperStatus should change to up(1) if the interface is ready to transmit and receive network traffic - It should change todormant(5) if the interface is waiting for external actions (such as a serial line waiting for an incoming connection) - It should remain in the down(2) state if and only if there is a fault that prevents it from going to the up(1) state - It should remain in the notPresent(6) state if the interface has missing(typically, hardware) components.

trigger_prototype.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}])=2 and (last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}],#1)<>last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}],#2))
trigger_prototype.name: HP Enterprise Switch: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Bağlantı kesildi.
trigger_prototype.description:
This trigger expression works as follows: 1. It can be triggered if the operations status is down. 2. `{$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1` - a user can redefine the context macro to "0", marking this interface as not important. No new trigger will be fired if this interface is down. 3. `{TEMPLATE_NAME:METRIC.diff()}=1` - the trigger fires only if the operational status was up to (1) sometime before (so, does not fire for "eternal off" interfaces.)
WARNING: if closed manually - it will not fire again on the next poll, because of .diff.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Arayüz tipi.
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The type of interface. Additional values for ifType are assigned by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA), through updating the syntax of the IANAifType textual convention.

trigger_prototype.expression: min(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.in.errors[ifInErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}],5m)>{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"} or min(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.out.errors[ifOutErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}],5m)>{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: max(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.in.errors[ifInErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}],5m)<{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}*0.8 and max(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.out.errors[ifOutErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}],5m)<{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}*0.8
trigger_prototype.name: HP Enterprise Switch: Arayüz {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Yüksek hata oranı.
trigger_prototype.event_name: HP Enterprise Switch: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): High error rate (>{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"} for 5m)
trigger_prototype.description: It recovers when it is below 80% of the `{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}` threshold.

dependency.name: HP Enterprise Switch: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Bağlantı kesildi.
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}])=2 and (last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}],#1)<>last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}],#2))

trigger_prototype.expression: change(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}])<0 and last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}])>0 and ( last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}])=6 or last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}])=7 or last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}])=11 or last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}])=62 or last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}])=69 or last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.type[ifType.{#SNMPINDEX}])=117 ) and (last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}])<>2)
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: (change(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}])>0 and last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}],#2)>0) or (last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}])=2)
trigger_prototype.name: HP Enterprise Switch: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Ethernet, önceki hızından daha düşük bir hıza değişti.
trigger_prototype.description: This Ethernet connection has transitioned down from its known maximum speed. This might be a sign of autonegotiation issues. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

dependency.name: HP Enterprise Switch: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Bağlantı kesildi.
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}])=2 and (last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}],#1)<>last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}],#2))

trigger_prototype.expression: (avg(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.in[ifHCInOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}],15m)>({$IF.UTIL.MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}]) or avg(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.out[ifHCOutOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}],15m)>({$IF.UTIL.MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}])) and last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}])>0
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: avg(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.in[ifHCInOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}],15m)<(({$IF.UTIL.MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}-3)/100)*last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}]) and avg(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.out[ifHCOutOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}],15m)<(({$IF.UTIL.MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}-3)/100)*last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}])
trigger_prototype.name: HP Enterprise Switch: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Yüksek bant genişliği kullanımı.
trigger_prototype.event_name: HP Enterprise Switch: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): High bandwidth usage (>{$IF.UTIL.MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}%)
trigger_prototype.description: The utilization of the network interface is close to its estimated maximum bandwidth.

dependency.name: HP Enterprise Switch: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Bağlantı kesildi.
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}])=2 and (last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}],#1)<>last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}],#2))

discovery_rule.name: EtherLike-MIB Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovering interfaces from IF-MIB and EtherLike-MIB. Interfaces with up(1) Operational Status are discovered.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Çift yönlü çalışma durumu.
item_prototype.description:
MIB: EtherLike-MIB The current mode of operation of the MAC entity. 'unknown' indicates that the current duplex mode could not be determined.
Management control of the duplex mode is accomplished through the MAU MIB. When an interface does not support autonegotiation, or when autonegotiation is not enabled, the duplex mode is controlled using ifMauDefaultType. When autonegotiation is supported and enabled, duplex mode is controlled using ifMauAutoNegAdvertisedBits. In either case, the currently operating duplex mode is reflected both in this object and in ifMauType.
Note that this object provides redundant information with ifMauType. Normally, redundant objects are discouraged. However, in this instance, it allows a management application to determine the duplex status of an interface without having to know every possible value of ifMauType. This was felt to be sufficiently valuable to justify the redundancy. Reference: [IEEE 802.3 Std.], 30.3.1.1.32,aDuplexStatus.

trigger_prototype.name: HP Enterprise Switch: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Yarı çift yönlü modda.
trigger_prototype.description: Lütfen otomatik anlaşma ayarlarını ve kablolamayı kontrol ediniz.

discovery_rule.name: PSU Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovering all entities of hpicfSensorObjectId that ends with: 11.2.3.7.8.3.1 - power supplies and are present

item_prototype.name: {#ENT_DESCR}: Güç kaynağı durumu.
item_prototype.description: MIB: HP-ICF-CHASSIS Actual status indicated by the sensor: {#ENT_DESCR}

trigger_prototype.name: HP Enterprise Switch: {#ENT_DESCR}: Güç kaynağı kritik durumda.
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the power supply unit for errors

trigger_prototype.name: HP Enterprise Switch: {#ENT_DESCR}: Güç kaynağı uyarı durumunda.
trigger_prototype.description: Please check the power supply unit for errors

dependency.name: HP Enterprise Switch: {#ENT_DESCR}: Güç kaynağı kritik durumda.

item_prototype.name: {#SENSOR_INFO}: Sıcaklık.
item_prototype.description: MIB: ENTITY-SENSORS-MIB The most recent measurement obtained by the agent for this sensor. To correctly interpret the value of this object, the associated entPhySensorType, entPhySensorScale, and entPhySensorPrecision objects must also be examined.

trigger_prototype.name: HP Enterprise Switch: {#SENSOR_INFO}: Sıcaklık kritik eşik değerin üzerinde.
trigger_prototype.event_name: HP Enterprise Switch: {#SENSOR_INFO}: Temperature is above critical threshold: >{$TEMP_CRIT:"{#SENSOR_INFO}"}
trigger_prototype.description: This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

trigger_prototype.name: HP Enterprise Switch: {#SENSOR_INFO}: Sıcaklık uyarı eşik değerin üzerinde.
trigger_prototype.event_name: HP Enterprise Switch: {#SENSOR_INFO}: Temperature is above warning threshold: >{$TEMP_WARN:"{#SENSOR_INFO}"}
trigger_prototype.description: This trigger uses temperature sensor values as well as temperature sensor status if available

dependency.name: HP Enterprise Switch: {#SENSOR_INFO}: Sıcaklık kritik eşik değerin üzerinde.

trigger_prototype.name: HP Enterprise Switch: {#SENSOR_INFO}: Sıcaklık çok düşük.
trigger_prototype.event_name: HP Enterprise Switch: {#SENSOR_INFO}: Temperature is too low: <{$TEMP_CRIT_LOW:"{#SENSOR_INFO}"}

discovery_rule.name: Temp Status Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovering all entities of hpicfSensorObjectId that ends with: 11.2.3.7.8.3.3 - over temp status and are present

item_prototype.name: {#ENT_DESCR}: Sıcaklık durumu.
item_prototype.description: MIB: HP-ICF-CHASSIS Actual status indicated by the sensor: {#ENT_DESCR}

macro.description: Warning threshold of ICMP packet loss in %.
Warning threshold of the average ICMP response time in seconds.
Warning threshold of error packet rate. Can be used with interface name as context.
Filter out loopbacks, nulls, docker veth links and docker0 bridge by default
Time interval for the SNMP availability trigger.

trigger.expression: (last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/system.hw.uptime[hrSystemUptime.0])>0 and last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/system.hw.uptime[hrSystemUptime.0])<10m) or (last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/system.hw.uptime[hrSystemUptime.0])=0 and last(/HP Enterprise Switch by SNMP/system.net.uptime[sysUpTime.0])<10m)
trigger.name: HP Enterprise Switch: Ana bilgisayar yeniden başlatıldı.
trigger.event_name: HP Enterprise Switch: {HOST.NAME} yeniden başlatıldı. (çalışma süresi. < 10m)

dependency.name: HP Enterprise Switch: SNMP veri toplama yapılmıyor.
